snippet.title: Super Mega Baseball 4 Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order EA SPORTS™ Super Mega Baseball™ 4 Ballpark Edition:  http://x.ea.com/smb4/buy. 
Receive three-day early access and three additional stadiums (Peril Point at launch, Ciudad de Colores and Castillo Arena in July and August respectively)

Super Mega Baseball 4 officially launches worldwide June 2nd featuring baseball legend  David "Big Papi" Ortiz and Super Mega Legend Hammer Longballo as cover athletes. 

Super Mega Baseball 4 is where the Legends play. More than 200 larger-than-life versions of fan-favorite former pros like Babe Ruth, Randy Johnson, Jose Bautista, and Vladimir Guerrero are ready to step onto the field and join the roster of beloved Super Mega League All-Stars.The series’ signature combination of arcade-inspired style and immersive gameplay depth returns as the latest Super Mega Baseball title adds 6 all-new stadiums and more significant presentation upgrades, an entire lineup of fan-requested features, and expanded cross-gen and cross-platform multiplayer. 

Subscribe for more SMB4 Content: https://www.youtube.com/@supermegabaseball
Follow us on our socials: Twitter: @supmegbaseball, IG: @supmegbaseball, Facebook: Super Mega Baseball and TikTok: @supmegbaseball
🌍 Website: https://www.ea.com/games/super-mega-baseball/super-mega-baseball-4 

#SuperMegaBaseball4 #TheLegendsAreBack #SwingTheHammer 

(3-day early access not available on Nintendo Switch; Pre-order offer for PlayStation®4 and PlayStation®5 platforms only valid in the U.S. and Canada.) Conditions & restrictions apply. See https://www.ea.com/games/super-mega-baseball/super-mega-baseball-4/disclaimers for details.
